title: What is Enterprise edition
whatisSuperCard: Super V Card, with extraordinary personalization and powerful features, provides you with an elegant and easy to use theme interface, and super customized custom functions. You can change columns, links, custom backgrounds, add background music, set map navigation, add WeChat information and so on.It can integrate all information.
lightupScreen2Scan: Light up the screen,let others scan your screensaver to save your information,there is no need to go out with paper business card.
integrationInformation: Integrate personal information and show your personality. At the same time, millions of online and offline data are available for you, maximize your social connections
whatIsMicroPage1: Micro Page which is a tool with large templates, it provides the most powerful component system in China. It can help you insert the information of graphic, voice, video, navigation, goods, personal contact and so on in the page quickly, so that you can easily handle and make the first class and powerful activity,marketing pages.
whatIsMicroPage2: We provide a large number of poster templates for you, no matter which industry you are in, you can always meet your needs.
whatIsMicroPage4: It supports the introduction of the WeChat public number article,and you can edit it,insert your own ads.
QRCVshop: A shop that can generate QR Code-V shop
circleShop: A shop in a circle of friends
whatIsVshop: V shop which is a shop you can upload goods simply without any extra cost, each item in the shop can generate an independent QR Code, it can be shared, can be spread, can make commodity promotion poster online.
whatIsEnterprisePlus2: Do you still worrying about printing business cards? Enterprise + provides you a printing platform which combines online and offline. All business cards in this platform are sold at production price, 500 pieces (5 boxes) only cost 20 yuan. At the same time there are large number of business card templates for you, and no longer need to worry about the design.
moreFuncWaitForU: More features are waiting for you
whatIsMobileWebsite: Powerful, beautiful interface, pure mobile terminal operation backstage. You can add, delete, modify modules and information anytime and anywhere with a mobile phone. It cost 3800 yuan only, once paid, not limited to use and free upgrade forever. Our mission: To promote enterprises to achieve low cost Internet +
interfaceBeauty: Beautiful interface, optional increase or decrease function, powerful expansion.
easy2use: Mobile terminal operation, learn to operate in 5 minutes, easy to understand
addCardNoLimit: Unlimited add business cards, environmental protection, saving money, fashion
everyCardSpread: Every employee's business card is the communication point of the company
accountChange: The account can be renamed and transferable
earlyOpen: The earlier it purchased,the higher ranking on search engines
opOnMobileEasyToLearn: Handset operation, simple and easy to understand~
shake: Open bluetooth, use WeChat Shake Nearby, it will find your the business card.It is suitable for various places, so that your Super V Card can be widely spread quickly and effectively.
shareDescribe: Introduction of Super V Card and registration entrance
name: Name:
longPress: Long press to distinguish QR Code and follow official account to use card
recommentSetTopOA: We recommend that you stick this official account on top in WeChat
toLearnHow2SetTopOA: Show how to stick official account on top?
how2SetTopOA: How to stick official account on top?
step1: 1.Open the official account you have followed,click on the top right corner“
step2: 2.Please turn on “Receive Messages” and “Sticky On Top” at the same time.
step3: Now official account is stuck on top.
